## About Me

Full Stack Software Engineer in NYC. Florida State grad. 

Passionate about golfer and playing electric guitar.

Healthy obsession with personal investing and finance

## Tech Skills

**Languages:** Javascript, Python, C++, HTML, CSS, SQL

**Tools:** AWS, Git, Flask, Heroku, Netlify, Jenkins, CircleCI, Jest, Cypress, RESTful API’s, Shell Scripts

**Frameworks:** React / Redux, Gatsby, Serverless
